content: this is my very first typed up pattern it has not been tested by anyone but me the pattern is pretty simple to do and works up fast you can change the size of your washcloth by adding or subtracting chains from the base chain you can make and sell these washcloths as much as you want but don t sell the pattern you can download and share the pattern also just don t claim it as your own creation please get the pattern here on my blog 1 1 https //hilarylardin wixsite com/mysite
